# Evaluate the current seletion in our Scheme interpreter # # The interpreter you use should be set in the environment # variable TM_SCHEME_EVALUATOR
INTERPRET=${TM_SCHEME_INTERPRETER:=csi} CMD=$(basename "$INTERPRET")
# Run depending on the system are we on? if [ $CMD == "mzscheme" ] ; then "$INTERPRET" -vm -e "$TM_SELECTED_TEXT" elif [ $CMD == "csi" ] ; then "$INTERPRET" -e "$TM_SELECTED_TEXT" fi
